snippet.title: iLLANG - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
[An alert has been issued for the Illang, and the residents of Koji Village are in danger!]

Whether picking apples or watering flowers in the garden, it is equally perilous now with the Illang on the prowl, waiting to prey on its victims.

The Bodyguard, renowned for his impeccable sword skills, was caught off guard and fell victim to the Illang. Detective Rin, also known as the Sherlock Holmes of Koji Village, is examining the evidence with her magnifying glass.  The Illang could be anyone, even someone hiding among the villagers. False accusations are rampant, despite the residents' desire to find the culprit.  Only time will tell if Rin's magnifying glass is powerful enough to reveal the truth.

iLLANG will be available on Nintendo Switch, iOS and Android on February 8, 2024.

Learn more at: https://www.playillang.com

iOS: https://apple.co/3SwdFAm
Google Play: https://bit.ly/iLLANG-GP

🎮 Learn More About Challengers Games: 
✼ Website: https://www.challengersgames.com/
✼ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@ChallengersGames
✼ Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/ChallengersCorp 
✼ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ChallengersGamesCorp 
✼ Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/ZqsUCsB7y3 

#iLLANG #SocialDeduction #Game
